name: Or Litany
content: Or Litany – 3D Computer Vision & Generative AI Researcher at NVIDIA and Technion Or Litany orlitany at gmail dot com I'm a Senior Research Scientist at NVIDIA and an Assistant Professor at the Technion, specializing in 3D computer vision and generative AI. I'm honored to be a 2023 Azrieli Faculty Fellow and a Taub Fellow. Previously, I conducted postdoctoral research at Stanford University under Prof. Leonidas Guibas, and at FAIR, hosted by Prof. Jitendra Malik. My PhD is from Tel-Aviv University, advised by Prof. Alex Bronstein. My B.Sc. in Physics and Mathematics is from the Hebrew University. / / / / News Nov, 2025 "Appreciate the View" is accepted at 3DV 2026. August, 2025 "Gaussian See, Gaussian Do" accepted at SIGGRAPH-ASIA 2025. June, 2025 Two papers accepted at ICCV 2025. May, 2025 "FRIDU" is accepted at SGP 2025. March, 2025 Honored to chair the Research Interaction sessions at the upcoming 3DV 2026. Feb 12, 2025 OmniRe got a spotlight at ICLR 2025. Feb 2, 2025 I will serve as an Area Chair for the upcoming ICCV 2025. Jan 5, 2025 Epi-NAF is accepted at ISBI 2025 as an Oral. Dec 21, 2024 Two workshops accepted at CVPR 2025. Students I am actively seeking talented and motivated Postdoctoral and PhD candidates to join my new lab at the Technion. To get a sense of the research areas I am most passionate about, I encourage you to explore my recent publications and invited talks.
